definition[0]_en: A category of linked data work that is an aggregation of metadata description sets that describe two or more instances of one or more entities.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A category of linked data work that is an aggregation of metadata description sets that describe two or more instances of one or more entities.

definition[0]_en: A category of linked data work that defines classes and properties that are used in a dataset.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A category of linked data work that defines classes and properties that are used in a dataset.

definition[0]_en: A category of linked data work that contains concepts that are used as values for properties in a dataset.
ToolkitDefinition_en: A category of linked data work that contains concepts that are used as values for properties in a dataset.
